item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Heres a quick example of a script:

[scar]program DoStuff;

var
x, y: Integer;

procedure ClickSomewhere;
begin
BlahBlahBlah;
if(blah) then blahblah;
end;

function isStuffHapenning: Boolean;
begin
Result:=false;
if(stuff) then Result:=true;
end;

begin
ActivateCleint;
if (this) then
begin
clickSomewhere;
end;
if isStuffHappening then exit;
end.[/scar]
Ok that script is pointless, but if you see a script like this, that has the program thing at the top, and some procedures or functions, then a main loop (begin then stuff then end.) Than thats all you need, just replace whats in the main window with that. If its just a procedure, ask someone where you should put it.

Hope this makes sense.

-Weibs

Read full topic
